description:
Intelligent carry for your every day life. This sling pack carries everything you need for a few hours on the go. Internal organization ensures that your phone, tablet and essentials are protected, yet easy to access.

  • Made of durable and water-resistant polyester
  • Webbing strap with cushy foam pad can be worn as a waistbelt or an over-the-shoulder sling
  • Inner organizer pockets for batteries and cables, including a fleece-lined sleeve for a tablet
  • Hidden daisy chains can be deployed to attach extra gear or clip on a blinky bike light
name: MEC 8 Hr Sling - Unisex
